channel.title: SWS: Teens in Space (Saturdays in October)
channel.description:
![](https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/gauntlet-hangouts.appspot.com/o/-MDkg5JJ6QmYN7yTNx0v?alt=media&token=aea10d88-b719-42be-b607-9a59149d7d2c) The sound of the photon-powered battering ram echoes in your ship. Your Kaminoan pilot informs you that the doors have an 83.4% chance of breaking with the next hit. The cyborg Quarren to your right is checking and rechecking her enhancements. Your hand rests on the blaster at your hip as you hear the battering ram powering up again. As it hits, the sound of metal rending sends the rest of your crew to **high alert** . But you smile.
*This is going to be fun...*
----------------------------------- *Teens in Space* is a space opera RPG that uses the “Powered by *Kids on Bikes* ” system, first used in the award winning *Kids on Bikes* . *Teens in Space* is a rules-light storytelling system **that takes you into the cosmos for adventure and profit.**
The Adventures of *Teens in Space* take place across the vast and sometimes uncharted reaches of the universe, with fantastical things like:
* Diverse and interesting alien species of all shapes and sizes * Powerful faster than light space ships that can take you across the universe * Strange, beautiful, and even terrifying worlds ripped right from your imagination
*Teens in Space* takes characters to places beyond our celestial comfort zone, out into the cosmos where anything and everything *could* happen.
A seat has been reserved for Sabine V.
----------------------------------- This game is part of the ongoing Star Wars Saturdays series. The time setting is *after* the end of Episode VI of the Star Wars movie series (that's *Return of the Jedi* ) when the Empire is falling and the Alliance to Restore the Republic is taking control in fits and starts.
Characters and settings created in this miniseries will exist in the SWS canon for future miniseries and added to [our wiki](https://starwarssaturdays.miraheze.org/wiki/Main_Page).
**CW: Violence, Imperial power abuse. Romance and other strong emotional ties.** **System** : *Powered by Kids on Bikes* **Duration** : Five 3 hour sessions **Breaks** : 1 mid-point break per session (10 mins) **Venue** : GM’s Zoom **Recording** : Yes, but made public only if consent by all the players **Attendance** : Joining all sessions is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend. **Safety** : Lines & Veils, X-card, and open door policy. Tools can be changed to suit the players.This game will follow the [Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html).
[date=2020-10-03 time=10:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-10-03 time=13:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 1](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MDkg5JJ6QmYN7yTNx0v) [date=2020-10-10 time=10:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-10-10 time=13:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 2](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MDkg6cmSAtgaK6A4-fM) [date=2020-10-17 time=10:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-10-17 time=22:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 3](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MDkg85RXpfjmufNW2RL) [date=2020-10-24 time=10:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-10-24 time=22:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 4](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MDkg9PdFYdqiDd-bH5B) [date=2020-10-31 time=10:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-10-31 time=22:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 5](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MDkgAawdsK0uRrww05D)

item.title: SWS: Teens in Space (Saturdays in October)
item.dc:creator: @RichRogers
item.description:
@RichRogers wrote:


The sound of the photon-powered battering ram echoes in your ship.
Your Kaminoan pilot informs you that the doors have an 83.4% chance of breaking with the next hit.
The cyborg Quarren to your right is checking and rechecking her enhancements.
Your hand rests on the blaster at your hip as you hear the battering ram powering up again.
As it hits, the sound of metal rending sends the rest of your crew to high alert . But you smile.

This is going to be fun…

Teens in Space is a space opera RPG that uses the “Powered by Kids on Bikes ” system, first used in the award winning Kids on Bikes . Teens in Space is a rules-light storytelling system that takes you into the cosmos for adventure and profit.

The Adventures of Teens in Space take place across the vast and sometimes uncharted reaches of the universe, with fantastical things like:

  • Diverse and interesting alien species of all shapes and sizes
  • Powerful faster than light space ships that can take you across the universe
  • Strange, beautiful, and even terrifying worlds ripped right from your imagination

Teens in Space takes characters to places beyond our celestial comfort zone, out into the cosmos where anything and everything could happen.

A seat has been reserved for Sabine V.

This game is part of the ongoing Star Wars Saturdays series. The time setting is after the end of Episode VI of the Star Wars movie series (that’s Return of the Jedi ) when the Empire is falling and the Alliance to Restore the Republic is taking control in fits and starts.

Characters and settings created in this miniseries will exist in the SWS canon for future miniseries and added to our wiki.

CW: Violence, Imperial power abuse. Romance and other strong emotional ties.
System : Powered by Kids on Bikes
Duration : Five 3 hour sessions
Breaks : 1 mid-point break per session (10 mins)
Venue : GM’s Zoom
Recording : Yes, but made public only if consent by all the players
Attendance : Joining all sessions is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
Safety : Lines & Veils, X-card, and open door policy. Tools can be changed to suit the players.This game will follow the Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct.

Saturday, October 3, 2020 2:00 PM → Saturday, October 3, 2020 5:00 PM Session 1
Saturday, October 10, 2020 2:00 PM → Saturday, October 10, 2020 5:00 PM Session 2
Saturday, October 17, 2020 2:00 PM → Sunday, October 18, 2020 2:00 AM Session 3
Saturday, October 24, 2020 2:00 PM → Sunday, October 25, 2020 2:00 AM Session 4
Saturday, October 31, 2020 2:00 PM → Sunday, November 1, 2020 2:00 AM Session 5
